QuestData.Title: Malas the Corrupter
QuestData.Description: $n, head back down there!$B$BYou'll find the leader of Kolramas, Malas the Corrupter, gloating from atop the crashed necropolis.$B$BKill him and bring me his head!
QuestData.LogDescription: Sergeant Moonshard at Drak'Sotra insists that you return with the Head of the Corrupter.
QuestData.CompletionText: I look forward to mounting his head on a pike. Let's see him come back from that!
QuestData.RewardText: You're the $g hero : heroine; of the hour, $n.$B$B<Moonshard kicks the head away from him.>$B$BYou deserve our deepest respect, and something more I think.
